tests.query: with c as ( select 1 ID, toDate('2023-06-24') dt, 0 p ) select multiIf(t.ID = 1, formatRowNoNewline('JSONEachRow', dd), '') AS params     from (select ID, case when p = 0 then toString(date_add(hour, p, dt)) else '2022-01-01' end as dd from c) t;
tests.name: 02806_cte_block_cannot_be_empty.sql

tests.query: with c as ( select 1 ID, toDate('2023-06-24') dt, 0 p ) select multiIf(t.ID = 1, formatRowNoNewline('JSONEachRow', dd), '') AS params, dd from (select ID, case when p = 0 then toString(date_add(hour, p, dt)) else '2022-01-01' end as dd from c) t;
tests.name: 02806_cte_block_cannot_be_empty.sql
